API name: Weatherbit Hourly Weather Forecast REST API v2.0
Description: This Weatherbit API returns a 2 to 5-day forecast in 1 hour intervals for any point on the planet. It is Get requests that returns an hourly forecast when each point represents a one hour period for; Date, City, Postal and more. The supported response format is JSON with an API Key required for authentication. Weatherbit.io is historical weather, current weather, and forecasts API's.
